title: masafinance
author: masafinance
content: Hi there; we are launching a bounty and airdrop campaign for our project, Masa.You can learn more here: https://www.masa.finance/We are looking for great bounty managers to help us with a Bitcointalk bounty program. Please post links to previous bounty campaigns you have run.Thank you!

comments.author: milewilda
comments.body: Hi, you could visit out these threads.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5387456.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5032713.0Some are updated or still offering their service and some had completely stopped.Its always better to PM them directly to have some confirmation.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Check all of these lists too:- List Campaign Management Services- Overview of Bitcointalk Signature Anti-Spam Campaign ManagersAnother way is looking through the Bounties (Altcoins) and look at those managers there and contact them if you think that they're the one for you.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: You directly chat with the managers, i believe you have a good service yield great exposure to your project.Brainboss managements previous job at the service section https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5124215.0Hhampuz management service https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5079097.0yahoo62278 management serviceÂ https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1704638.0They are top ranked managers that will bring your project to success.Good luck

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: I'm trying to steer clear of bounties unless they escrow the tokens and a decent amount of cash as well. Too many scam bounties launching and I'm tired of the participants getting nothing for their work. So, if you aren't willing to escrow some cash, please find someone else.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on October 27, 2022, 07:13:12 AMYou did well for clearing the air in as much you want a project to be managed you are also protecting the interest of the bounty hunters aslso scraping away scam project.I do admires your passion.
